text:
Why do they insist that its to the right of the OS partition? 
It’s frustrating having to jump through extra hoops whenever a system disk needs
to be expanded. 
BRIAN ILLNER 
| 
Senior Systems Administrator 
864.250.9227 Office 
864.679.2537 Fax 
Canal Insurance Company 
101 N. Main Street, Suite 400 
Greenville, SC 29601 
[cid:image002.jpg@01DA491C.91E4BDD0]
